name: Dev Tools Shortcuts
body:
# Shortcuts Mac


# Shortcuts Windows

Open Developer Tools  
    F12, Ctrl + Shift+ I
Refresh the page  
     F5, Ctrl + R
Text search within current file or panel  
    Ctrl + F
Text search across all sources  
    Ctrl + Shift + F
Undo change  
    Ctrl + Z
Save changes to local modifications  
    Ctrl + S
Go to line  
    Ctrl + G
Search by filename  
    Ctrl + O
Go to member  
    Ctrl + Shift + O

[More Chrome Dev Tools Shortcuts](https://developer.chrome.com/devtools/docs/shortcuts )
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
